Provided however that, such Director, officer or member shall not be deemed to be guilty of that offence if he proves that the offence was committed without his knowledge or that he exercised all such diligence to prevent the commls- sion of such offence as he ought to have exercised in the circumstances having regard to the nature of his functions.
